message: I'm excited to offer you this great product! I think you'll really love it. Would you like to make an offer?
Thank you for offering me the product. I appreciate the excitement around it. I would like to propose a price of $140 for the product.
I appreciate your offer, Bob, but I was thinking more along the lines of $160. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit on this sale.
I understand your position, Alice. Let's try $150. I believe it's a fair price considering the value of the product.
I'm getting close to my minimum, Bob. I can do $155, but I need to make sure I'm getting a good deal. Let's meet in the middle at $155.
I'm willing to go up to $150. It's a fair compromise given the product's worth to both of us.
I'm not far off from my minimum, Bob. I can do $152, but I'm starting to think you're not serious about the product. I need to know you're willing to meet me at a fair price.
I appreciate your persistence, Alice. I am willing to pay $150 for the product. This seems like a reasonable compromise for both of us.
